author: @kamilziemian995
text: 3:19. With current version of Matplotlib (May 2018) you can just put add to ax_2v.fill_between option: label="something".

author: @Locke19901
text: I have to put the savefig line ABOVE plt.show().  If I don't I get:  _tkinter.TclError: can't invoke "wm" command: application has been destroyed

author: @AllisWell2207
text: Good work. I have two specific observations. If you have suggestions to circumvent please share.  1. fig.savefig() saves only after program execution terminates . 2. Because sub plot 2 is dual y axis, only x value is displayed at right corner  (on mouse over /movement)  Thanks Venkat
